about_the_game:
Calamity of Realms is a real-time strategy game combining massive SLG and RTS mechanism, where players can choose to lead one of powerful factions in Chinese legends and mythsm like the Tang Dynasty, the Heavenly Realm, or the Underworld, and embark on a journey of conquest.

In this game, you will command your armies in fierce battles, with a wide array of troops and units at your disposal, allowing for unique tactical combinations—ranging from humble foot soldiers to massive mythical beasts.

You can also take direct control of your generals and heroes, engaging in intense duels with enemies. Each hero comes with a distinct set of skills and tactics, making them vital to your strategies.

Additionally, you have the ability to construct towering cities and fortifications to defend against the enemy’s advancing forces.

Your ultimate goal is to build a mighty nation and army, leading them to conquer every divine domain and carve out your legacy as the supreme ruler.

short_description: Calamity of Realms is a real-time strategy game based on traditional Chinese mythology. Pick one of the three factions, build armies, and conquer. Crafted by an indie studio for a distinct, challenging experience.
